snippet: Great excitement exists in the vicinity of Cumberland, about the failure of the Maryland Mining Company. The laborers blocked up the road, and would not allow the loaded cars of the Company to be brought to Baltimore....
lead_paragraph: Great excitement exists in the vicinity of Cumberland, about the failure of the Maryland Mining Company. The laborers blocked up the road, and would not allow the loaded cars of the Company to be brought to Baltimore.

headline.main: LATEST INTELLIGENCE.; By Telegraph to The New-York Times. Failure of the Maryland Mining Co.--Sickness on board the Ship Vandalia, &c.-Southern Mail Items. &c.
